author: Bartkova, Katarina and Delais-Roussarie, Elisabeth and Santiago Vargas, Fabian
title: PROSOTRAN : un système d'annotation symbolique des faits prosodiques pour les données non-standards (PROSOTRAN : an tool that provides a symbolic representation of the prosodic events in non-standard data) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 1: JEP
